:insert-cite.label: t__Citation
:insert-cite.description: t__A bibliographic citation that refers to a book, article or other form of content. It specifically identifies the title of the resource.

:insert-indexterm.label: t__Index term
:insert-indexterm.description: t__An entry for a generated index. The content is not output as part of the content, only as part of the index.

:insert-keyword.label: t__Keyword
:insert-keyword.description: t__A word or phrase with a unique or key-like value.

:insert-navtitle.label: t__Navigation title
:insert-navtitle.description: t__An alternative title for a topic. Used when the actual title of the topic isnâ€™t appropriate for use in a table of contents or other kinds of navigation.

:insert-term.label: t__Term
:insert-term.description: t__A word or phrase that may have or require an extended definition or explanation.

:toggle-ph.label: t__Phrase
:toggle-ph.description: t__A phrase is used to organize content for reuse or conditional processing.

:toggle-q.label: t__Quote
:toggle-q.description: t__Text quoted from another source. This element is used for short quotes that are displayed inline.
